title: e....er...........r%A^#@#@8^$2%^79r
author: 酒保的起点
txt_content:
Generating world......
Loading.........error!:0x80070422caveat!

I....nternal e...........r.....ror d.......et.......ected


system breakdown
Restarting...

Restart failed

Self-destructing........

replies.txt_content:
这个难道就是传说中的乱码皮肤
这就很迷离

replies.txt_content: 乱码还行，我差点就举报了

replies.author: StreamReader
replies.txt_content: 看到标题果断点进来，还以为是水龙头

replies.author: 天空的大楼
replies.txt_content: 建议楼主改下标题，这个标题容易被误认为灌水

replies.author: 酒保的起点
replies.txt_content:

乱码还行，我差点就举报了
改了就不适合这个皮肤了嘛
